COMPANY NAME: Leading telecommunication and IT based company
JOB RESPONSIBILITIES: Providing logical troubleshooting support for infrastructure backbone (MPLS, L2, L3, and GPON etc.), Telco (2G, 3G, 4G etc.) services, and L2/L3 services of ISP, ICX, IGW, IIG and Govt. Age 22 to 30 years
